T.name: m
T.description: stellar magnitude

T.name: north
T.description: Used on the GoogleMap to indicate is the position north or south of the center line

T.name: south
T.description: Used on the GoogleMap to indicate is the position north or south of the center line

T.name: MainForm.msgGeoCoord
T.english: Please enter the geographical coordinates of your site.
T.translated: 観測地の経緯度を入力して下さい。

T.name: MainForm.msgSynchronizing
T.description: {0} is the name of the feed that is being processed

T.name: MainForm.msgLastUpdated
T.description: {0} is the date when OW has last updated

T.name: MainForm.msgErrorUpdating
T.description: {0} is the date when the error has occured

T.name: MainForm.msgInitialDownload
T.english: OccultWatcher has to download the intial events information. This may take a couple of minutes depending on your internet connection speed.
T.translated: OccultWatcher は最近の現象をダウンロ－ドします。これは通信速度により数分かかります。

T.name: MainForm.statusNew
T.description: Please keep the space at the begining. This status will be appended to the last updated date in the events list for new events

T.name: AccountOptionsForm.Title
T.translated: アカウント・オプション

T.name: AccountOptionsForm.cbxNotify
T.translated: アップデートの通知をさせる

T.name: AccountOptionsForm.lblNotify
T.english: Notify me if other observers change their site location for my chosen events. Notifications are sent by email only in the last day before the event.
T.translated: 抽出した現象での観測者の観測地に変更があったら知らせてください。通知は、現象の前日に電子メールで通知されます。

T.name: MaintenanceForm.msgResetWarning
T.english: All settings will be deleted. This will also purge the database deleting all cached content. All current predictions will have to be downloaded again. Your announced stations will not be affected. Press 'Yes' to continue.
T.translated: 全ての設定が削除されます。これは削除後にキャッシュした物も含めて全てが削除されます。全ての予報減少は再ダウンロードされます。あなたの設定した観測地も影響を受けます。続けるには 'Yes' を押してください。

T.name: MaintenanceForm.msgPurgeDatabaseWarning
T.english: Purging OccultWatcher database will effectively delete all cached content. All current predictions will have to be downloaded again. Your announced stations will not be affected. Press 'Yes' to continue.
T.translated: OccultWatcherのデータベースを、キャッシュしている物を含め全て削除します。全ての内容は全ての予報内容は再度ダウンロードされます。あなたの報告した観測地には影響はありません。続けるには 'はい' を押してください。

T.name: OptionsForm.lblMySite
T.english: Specify your site's geographic position for the calculations
T.translated: 計算のためにあなたの場所を設定して下さい

T.name: OptionsForm.rbAzimuthDirection
T.description: Don't translate this for now as currently you cannot redefine the dirrection designations individually. If you prefer to have them translated please contact me.
T.english: N, NE, E, SE, S, SW, W, NW

T.name: OptionsForm.grpFilter
T.description: make sure you keep all the spaces before the word

T.name: OptionsForm.gbxFilter
T.translated: この現象は表示しない ...

T.name: OptionsForm.lblDefaultFilterDescr
T.english: The default filter is used for all feeds for which no custom filter is defined
T.translated: デフォルトのフィルターが、フィルター設定されていない全ての項目に使われています

T.name: OptionsForm.lblAsteroidSmaller
T.english: The asteroid shadow is smaller than

T.name: OptionsForm.lblKeepShowing
T.english: Keep showing old events from the past
T.translated: 過去の現象も表示する日数

T.name: OptionsForm.cbDistanceType.5
T.translated: 経路の10倍領域（衛星の発見のため）

T.name: OptionsForm.lblOnNewEvents
T.translated: 新しい、または更新された現象

T.name: OptionsForm.cbAlertPopUpForm
T.translated: Occult Watcher を表示させる

T.name: OptionsForm.cbStartAutomatically
T.translated: Windows 起動時に OW も起動

T.name: OptionsForm.cbxUseChinaMaps
T.translated: 中国用 GoogleMaps を使う (http://ditu.google.com)

T.name: OptionsForm.btnCleanCache
T.translated: データベースを整理する

T.name: OptionsForm.lblPredictions
T.translated: 小惑星による食の予報

T.name: OptionsForm.lblEmailDescr
T.english: Your email address is used as your login name and uniquely identifies your account
T.translated: 電子メールアドレスはログイン名となり、あなた自身を確認するために使われます

T.name: OptionsForm.lblRegionDescr
T.english: Please choose your region for region specific OccultWatcher customizations
T.translated: OccultWatcher の設定のために、あなたの地域を選択して下さい

T.name: OptionsForm.lblNameDescr
T.english: Your display name is visible to the other observers when you announce your observing sites. This is usually your name or an alias which you use
T.translated: あなたの表示名は、連絡された観測地と共に表示されます。

T.name: OptionsForm.cbxUseExisting
T.translated: 存在するアカウントを使う

T.name: OptionsForm.btnAccOptions
T.translated: アカウント・オプション

T.name: OptionsForm.lblPlannerConnecting
T.english: Connecting to the Observation Planning Service ...
T.translated: 観測計画サーバーに接続中 ...

T.name: OptionsForm.msgLongDeg
T.english: Specify a non negative integer number in the range 0..180
T.translated: 0-180の間でマイナスの数値を表示しない

T.name: OptionsForm.msgMin
T.english: Specify a non negative integer number in the range 0..59
T.translated: 0-59の間でマイナスの数値を表示しない

T.name: OptionsForm.msgLatDeg
T.english: Specify a non negative integer number in the range 0..90
T.translated: 0-90の間でマイナスの数値を表示しない

T.name: OptionsForm.msgDistance
T.english: Specify a non negative integer number.
T.translated: マイナスの数値を表示しない

T.name: OptionsForm.msgMagnitude
T.translated: 確実な恒星の光度を表示

T.name: OptionsForm.msgAltitude
T.translated: 確実な恒星の高度を表示

T.name: OptionsForm.msgAstSize
T.translated: 確実な小惑星の大きさを表示

T.name: OptionsForm.errNoEmail
T.translated: あなたの電子メールアドレスを入力して下さい

T.name: OptionsForm.errNoName
T.translated: あなたの名前かニックネームを入力して下さい

T.name: OptionsForm.errBlankPass
T.translated: 空白のパスワードは使用できません

T.name: OptionsForm.errPassNotMatch
T.english: Password and repeated password don't match. Please try again.
T.translated: パスワードと再入力パスワードが一致しません。もう一度入力して下さい。

T.name: OptionsForm.msgAccConfigOk
T.translated: あなたのアカウントが設定されました。

T.name: OptionsForm.errAccConfig
T.english: There was a problem configuring existing account. The account may not exist or the password could be wrong.
T.translated: アカウントに問題があります。そのアカウントは存在しないか、パスワードが違います。

T.name: OptionsForm.msgAccCreatedOk
T.translated: あなたのアカウントは登録されました

T.name: OptionsForm.msgAccUpdatedOk
T.english: Your account information has been updated
T.translated: あなたのアカウント情報が更新されました

T.name: OptionsForm.msgRestart
T.translated: OccultWatcher は再起動されます。

T.name: OptionsForm.msgMarkedForSync
T.english: The feed has been marked for synchronisation. Close the dialog to synchronise.
T.translated: この項目は同期が必要です。同期されるよう、ダイアログを閉じて下さい。

T.name: OptionsForm.lblDefineCustomFiler
T.description: {0} will be the name of the feed
T.english: Define custom filter for the {0} feed events
T.translated: {0} の現象についてフィルターを設定して下さい

T.name: OptionsForm.txtHome
T.description: This is the default name of the first entered site (location)

T.name: OptionsForm.miEditSavedSites
T.translated: 保存された観測地を編集

T.name: ProxyForm.Title
T.translated: プロキシ サーバーの設定

T.name: ProxyForm.cbxUseProxy
T.translated: プロキシ サーバー使う

T.name: ProxyForm.lblProxyName
T.translated: プロキシのアドレスとポート (例： http://myproxy:8080/

T.name: ProxyForm.msgTestingProxy
T.english: OccultWatcher will test the connection through the proxy. This may lead to the program being not responding for up to 1 min.
T.translated: OccultWatcher はプロキシを利用して接続を試しています。これには 1分以上はかからないでしょう。

T.name: ProxyForm.msgTestingProxySuccess
T.english: The proxy test successed. However some anonymous proxies may be rejected by the servers hosting OccultWatcher feeds.
T.translated: プロキシのテストに成功しました。しかしいくつかのプロクシ サーバーは OccultWatcher では利用できません。

T.name: ProxyForm.titleErrorTesting
T.translated: プロクシ テストにエラー

T.name: SavedSitesForm.Title
T.translated: 観測地を保存しました

T.name: SavedSitesForm.txtNew
T.description: This is the default name of a new site

T.name: SavedSitesForm.msgDeleteConfirm
T.description: {0} will be the name of the site to be deleted

T.name: Occultations.txtCaption
T.description: {0} は小惑星名で {1} は恒星名

T.name: Occultations.lnkShowOnlineMap
T.translated: ｵﾝﾗｲﾝ ﾏｯﾌﾟ に観測地を表示

T.name: Occultations.msgNoStations
T.english: There are currently no announced stations for this event.
T.translated: この現象への観測地は今のところ報告されていません。

T.name: Occultations.msgOneStation
T.english: There is currently 1 announced station for this event.
T.translated: この現象について1つの観測地が報告されています。

T.name: Occultations.msgNStations
T.description: {0} will be the number of stations
T.english: There are currently {0} announced stations for this event.
T.translated: この現象について {0} の観測地が報告されています。

T.name: Occultations.msgNoneYours
T.translated: これらにあなたは含まれていません。

T.name: Occultations.msgNYours
T.description: {0} will be the number of stations

T.name: Occultations.txtDistLimit1
T.translated: 限界線 1 からの距離

T.name: Occultations.txtDistLimit2
T.translated: 限界線 2 からの距離

T.name: Occultations.txtDistLimit3
T.translated: 限界線 3 からの距離

T.name: Occultations.txtDistLimit4
T.translated: 限界線 4 からの距離

T.name: Occultations.txtSignNote
T.english: Note: Negative numbers indicate that the site is at a different side of the shadow.
T.translated: 注意：マイナスの数字は、 の観測地が、影の反対側にあることを意味します。

T.name: Occultations.txtEventListed
T.translated: この現象は次にリストされます：

T.name: Occultations.locShadow
T.description: {0} will be the distance and {1} the unit (km or miles)
T.english: In the shadow, {0} {1} from the central line

T.name: Occultations.loc1Sigma
T.description: {0} will be the distance and {1} the unit (km or miles)
T.english: In the 1-sigma zone, {0} {1} outside the shadow path
T.translated: 1-σ領域の中。影の経路から {0} {1} 外側

T.name: Occultations.locOutside1Sigma
T.description: {0} will be the distance and {1} the unit (km or miles)

T.name: Occultations.lbl10PWCenter
T.translated: 中央線から 10 パスの幅

T.name: Occultations.lnkGE
T.translated: 'Google Earth の kml ファイルを保存

T.name: Occultations.linkShowDetailsOnTheWeb
T.translated: web の詳細情報を見る

T.name: StationSort.Title
T.translated: {0} から {1} までの観測地を並べ替えします

T.name: GoogleMap.txtClickHint
T.translated: 編集または削除はクリック

T.name: GoogleMap.txtLong
T.description: Shown on your own station's baloon

T.name: GoogleMap.txtLat
T.description: Shown on your own station's baloon

T.name: GoogleMap.txtEditStation
T.description: Shown on your own station's baloon
T.english: To edit this station info click {0}here{1}
T.translated: 観測地情報を編集するには {0}ここをクリック{1}

T.name: GoogleMap.txtDeleteStation
T.description: Shown on your own station's baloon
T.translated: 観測地を削除するには {0}ここをクリック{1}

T.name: GoogleMap.txtCenterStation
T.description: Shown on your own station's baloon
T.translated: 観測地を中央にするには {0}ここをクリック{1}

T.name: GoogleMap.txtCurrentSelection
T.english: Your currently selected site coordinates are: {0}, {1}. The site is {2}{3} from the central line.{4}Right-click on the map to select a different site or press submit to announce this site as your observing location.
T.translated: あなたの観測地は {0}、{1} です。この場所は中央線から {2}{3} です。{4} 別の観測地を選択したり、そこをあなたの観測地にする時は、地図上を右クリックして下さい。

T.name: GoogleMap.errNoObservingMethod
T.translated: 観測方法を選択して下さい。

T.name: GoogleMap.errNoTimingMethod
T.translated: 計時方法を選択して下さい。

T.name: GoogleMap.errEventToFar
T.english: This event is too far in future.
T.translated: この現象は、ずいぶん先のものです。

T.name: GoogleMap.errEventPassed
T.translated: この現象はすでに終了しました。

T.name: GoogleMap.errMaxStationsEvent
T.english: You have reached the maximum number of allowed stations per event.
T.translated: この現象についての観測地の最大数に達しました。

T.name: GoogleMap.errMaxStationsAll
T.english: You have reached the maximum number of allowed stations for the incomming events.
T.translated: 今後の現象についての観測地の最大数に達しました。

T.name: GoogleMap.errMaxEventsAll
T.english: The maximum number of active incomming events has been reached. Please contact Hristo Pavlov (hristo_dpavlov@yahoo.com)
T.translated: 今後の現象の最大数に達しました。Hristo Pavlov (hristo_dpavlov@yahoo.com) に連絡して下さい。

T.name: GoogleMap.errInvalidEvent
T.translated: 現象を見つけられませんでした。

T.name: GoogleMap.errInvalidStation
T.translated: 観測地を見つけられませんでした。

T.name: GoogleMap.errSubmitting
T.translated: 場所を受け取ることができませんでした。

T.name: GoogleMap.errCancelling
T.translated: 観測地をキャンセルできませんでした。

T.name: GoogleMap.errUpdating
T.translated: 場所を更新できませんでした。

T.name: GoogleMap.errConnecting
T.english: Error connecting to the Observation Planning Service
T.translated: 観測計画サーバーへの接続にエラーがあります

T.name: GoogleMap.errSubmittedSuccess
T.english: Your position has been submitted successfully! To submit the position of another station please close this form and reopen it.
T.translated: あなたの場所は登録に成功しました！ 他の観測地を登録するには、このフォームを閉じて、再び開いて下さい。

T.name: GoogleMap.errUpdatedSuccess
T.english: Your position has been updated successfully! To add/update more stations please close this form and reopen it.
T.translated: あなたの場所は更新に成功しました！ 他の観測地を追加や編集するには、このフォームを閉じて、再び開いて下さい。

T.name: GoogleMap.msgConfirmDeleteSite
T.english: Are you sure you want to delete this site?
T.translated: この観測地を削除したいですか？

T.name: GoogleMap.txtClickToStart
T.english: Right click on the map to define another observing site.
T.translated: 他の観測者の場所を、地図上で右クリックして表示します。

T.name: GoogleMap.txtOtherStations
T.english: Observing locations currently announced by other observers:
T.translated: 他の観測者から知らされた現在の観測地：

T.name: AboutForm.lblTranslationNote
T.description: Credits note for your translation. In English this is blank. Please translate it for your language. If I was doing translation to Bulgarian for example I would write 'Преведе на Български - Христо Павлов' which means 'Translated to Bulgarian by Hristo Pavlov'
T.translated: [KODA] が [日本語] に翻訳しました

T.name: left
T.description: Used on the GoogleMap to indicate is the position left or right of the center line

T.name: right
T.description: Used on the GoogleMap to indicate is the position left or right of the center line

T.name: L
T.description: Short 1 letter abbreviation for Left

T.name: R
T.description: Short 1 letter abbreviation for Right

T.name: direction.N
T.description: Short abbreviation for North

T.name: direction.NE
T.description: Short abbreviation for North-East

T.name: direction.E
T.description: Short abbreviation for East

T.name: direction.SE
T.description: Short abbreviation for South-East

T.name: direction.S
T.description: Short abbreviation for South

T.name: direction.SW
T.description: Short abbreviation for South-West

T.name: direction.W
T.description: Short abbreviation for West

T.name: direction.NW
T.description: Short abbreviation for North-West

T.name: OptionsForm.cbxFeedFilters.1
T.description: The name of the 'Default' filter

T.name: GoogleMap.submitButton.Submit
T.description: The 'submit' button which was not translated before.
T.translated: あなたの観測地を登録

T.name: GoogleMap.submitButton.Update
T.description: The 'update' button which was not translated before.

T.name: StationSort.txtCenterRLLine
T.description: The new left/right from centre line label on the station sorts form

T.name: StationSort.txtRightLimit
T.description: The new left/right from centre line label on the station sorts form

T.name: StationSort.txtLeftLimit
T.description: The new left/right from centre line label on the station sorts form

T.name: StationSort.txtRightLimit1Sigma
T.description: The new left/right from centre line label on the station sorts form

T.name: StationSort.txtLeftLimit1Sigma
T.description: The new left/right from centre line label on the station sorts form

T.name: StationSort.txtRightLimit2Sigma
T.description: The new left/right from centre line label on the station sorts form

T.name: StationSort.txtLeftLimit2Sigma
T.description: The new left/right from centre line label on the station sorts form

T.name: StationSort.txtRightLimit3Sigma
T.description: The new left/right from centre line label on the station sorts form

T.name: StationSort.txtLeftLimit3Sigma
T.description: The new left/right from centre line label on the station sorts form

T.name: OptionsForm.cbMyEvents
T.description: The title of the new Show 'My Events' check box

T.name: OptionsForm.lblFeedsDescr
T.description: The description for the feeds.
T.english: The OccultWatcher experience wouldn't be possible without the people publishing predictions computed with Dave Herald's Occult. Please select from the list below the feeds you want OccultWatcher to monitor for you.
T.translated: OccultWatcher の機能は、Dave Herald 氏のソフト Occult で計算して予報を人々に公開している人々の存在によるものです。OccultWatcher に表示させたいものを、下のリストから選んでください。

T.name: OccultationPlanner.txtStatistics
T.description: This is the info label showing the number of registered users, events, stations. {0}, {1} and {2} will be the number of users, events, stations
T.english: Currently there are: {0} users; {1} coordinated events; {2} stations;
T.translated: 現在： {0} 人のユーザー; {1} 件の予報; {2} の観測地 があります

T.name: OccultationPlanner.errNewerVersionRequired
T.description: A new version needed error message.
T.english: A newer version of OccultWatcher is required to use the Observation Planner. This functionality will be disabled. Please download and install the latest version of OccultWatcher.
T.translated: OccultWatcher の新バージョンは、観測計画を利用します。この機能は無視できます。OccultWatcher の最新のバージョンをダウンロードしてインストールして下さい。

T.name: OptionsForm.errPlannerServiceDown
T.description: An error message shown when now connection could be established with the Observation Palnner
T.english: Could not connect to the Observation Planning Service. There is no internet connection or the server may be down.
T.translated: 観測計画サーバーに接続できませんでしたインターネット接続が無いか、サーバーがダウンしています。

T.name: MainForm.grpMyEvents
T.description: The name of the group 'My Events'

T.name: Occultations.locCentralLine
T.description: A site distance notice that could be used for some events. {0} is the distance and {1} is the units km/miles

T.description: The new link on the help menu linking to the Yahoo group

T.description: New pop-up menu item on right click on the events

T.name: GoogleMap.txtTeamSuccess

T.name: GoogleMap.txtYourContribution
T.description: New field that will be added to the GoogleMap to show the your current contribution to the team success. Not yet implemented in OW!

T.name: GoogleMap.txtYourContribution
T.description: New field that will be added to the GoogleMap to show the total contribution to the team success for all of your sites. Not yet implemented in OW!

T.name: Feed.IOTA.Name
T.translated: IOTA 確度の高い現象（全世界）

T.name: Feed.IOTA.Description
T.english: Steve Preston's predictions from www.asteroidoccultation.com. The published predictions are for higher probability events and are computed using recent highly accurate astrometric data. They are generally with very good accuracy, higher probability and small error.
T.translated: Steve Preston の www.asteroidoccultation.com の予報。公表される予報は確度が高く、最近の高精度の天測データを使って計算されています。それらは全体的にとても精度が良く、確実で、誤りが少ないです。

T.name: Feed.OZNZ.Name
T.notes: In XML instead of ampersand you should use '&'.
T.english: OZNZ Smaller Asteroid Events (South East Australia & New Zealand)
T.translated: OZNZ 小小惑星現象（南東オーストラリア & ニュージーランド）

T.name: Feed.OZNZ.Description
T.english: OZNZ (pronounced oz-noz) Extras are published by Dave Gault. These are low probability small asteroid events for the South-East Australia and New Zealand regions.
T.translated: Dave Gault による OZNZ（オズノズ）の拡張予報。これは南東オーストラリアとニュージーランド地域で起こる可能性がわずかにある小小惑星の現象です。

T.name: Feed.EastNA.Name
T.english: Eastern North America Low Probability Events
T.translated: アメリカ北東部の確度の低い現象

T.name: Feed.EastNA.Description
T.english: Eastern North America low probability asteroid occultations calculated using Occult C# by Brad Timerson.
T.translated: Brad Timerson による Occult C# を使った、アメリカ北東部の確度の低い現象

T.name: Feed.WestNA.Name
T.english: Western North America Low Probability Events
T.translated: アメリカ西部の確度の低い現象

T.name: Feed.WestNA.Description
T.english: Western North America low probability asteroid occultations feed is maintained by Tony George.
T.translated: Tony George による、アメリカ北西部の確度の低い現象

T.name: Feed.EAON.Name
T.translated: EAON 低確度現象（ヨーロッパ）

T.name: Feed.EAON.Description
T.english: The E.A.O.N. low probability events for the Europe region are maintained by Jean Schwaenen
T.translated: Jean Schwaenen による、ヨーロッパ地域での E.A.O.N. の低確度の現象

T.name: Feed.TNO.Name
T.description: This will be a new feed in ver 3

T.name: Feed.TNO.Description
T.description: This will be a new feed in ver 3
T.english: TNO Events is a list of asteroid predictions involving Trans Neptunian Objects and stars brighter than mag 15. The search is conducted using OccultV4, the latest astorb and NOMAD. The feed is maintained by Dave Gault, AUSTRALIA
T.translated: TNO 現象は、超海王星天体と 15等より明るい恒星による現象のリストです。これは OccultV4 と、astorbと、NOMAD から見いだされました。リストは、オーストラリアの Dave Gault によります。

T.name: Feed.NALowMag.Name
T.description: This will be a new feed in ver 3

T.name: Feed.NALowMag.Description
T.description: This will be a new feed in ver 3
T.note: In XML instead of the less than sign you should use '<'. Below the text reads '... magnitude drop less than 1 ...'
T.english: North America events of 50km+ asteroids with combined stellar and asteroid magnitudes of near 11 to not less than 12.9. Many of these have a magnitude drop <1. Maintained by Steve Messner.
T.translated: 北米の現象は、50km程の小惑星と11～12.0等までの恒星による現象です。これらの多くの減光量は <1 です。Steve Messner が提供します。

T.name: Occultations.miObserveFrom
T.description: {0} will be replaced with the site name

T.name: msgAccountPrefs
T.english: OccultWatcher user accounts have new preferences and details. Please review and update them.
T.translated: OccultWatcher user accounts have new preferences and details. Please review and update them.

T.name: frmUserInfo.msgConfirmInvalidName
T.english: Giving your real name and sirname will help you to be better recognized by the Asteroidal Occultations comunity members. Are you sure you want the Asteroidal Occultations comunity to see you as '{0}'?
T.translated: Giving your real name and sirname will help you to be better recognized by the Asteroidal Occultations comunity members. Are you sure you want the Asteroidal Occultations comunity to see you as '{0}'?

T.name: frmUserInfo.lblPublicEmail
T.english: Other observers that have submitted stations for the same events as me can see my email address.
T.translated: Other observers that have submitted stations for the same events as me can see my email address.

T.name: frmUserInfo.msgReviewAllTabs
T.english: You haven't reviewed all user information. Please check the other tabs before continuing.
T.translated: You haven't reviewed all user information. Please check the other tabs before continuing.

T.name: OptionsForm.lblPlannerInfo
T.english: The Observation Planning service allows observers from all over the world to plan better their observations by coordinating their site positions with everyone else, avoiding duplcated chords and helping to get better results. Observers can also report their observations.
T.translated: The Observation Planning service allows observers from all over the world to plan better their observations by coordinating their site positions with everyone else, avoiding duplcated chords and helping to get better results. Observers can also report their observations.

T.name: OptionsForm.lblNoAccountInfo
T.english: You currently haven't configured a user account on this computer. If you are observing asteroidal occultations you are encouraged to register and configure a user account.
T.translated: You currently haven't configured a user account on this computer. If you are observing asteroidal occultations you are encouraged to register and configure a user account.

T.name: OptionsForm.lblExistingAccountInfo
T.english: You have configured your user account on this computer. Don't forget to announce your stations at least a few days before you observe.
T.translated: You have configured your user account on this computer. Don't forget to announce your stations at least a few days before you observe.

T.name: Feed.Personal.Description
T.english: The special personal predictions feed is provided for OccultWatcher users so they can include their own events as an OCCELMNT file produced by Occult.
T.translated: The special personal predictions feed is provided for OccultWatcher users so they can include their own events as an OCCELMNT file produced by Occult.

T.name: min
T.description: abbreviation for 'minutes'

T.name: fp
T.description: Suffix for distances to indicate that they are calculated on the Fundamental Plane

T.name: Unnumbered
T.description: description for the number of unnumbered asteroids

T.name: DST
T.description: abbreviation for 'Daylight Saving Time'

T.name: yes
T.description: Used for parameters that may have a value of 'true' or 'false'

T.name: no
T.description: Used for parameters that may have a value of 'true' or 'false'

T.name: errPlannerSvcError
T.description: {0} will be replaced with the error message and \r\n\r\n should stay (new lines)
T.english: There was a problem connecting to the Observation Planning Service. The error is: \r\n\r\n{0}
T.translated: There was a problem connecting to the Observation Planning Service. The error is: \r\n\r\n{0}

T.name: AdvancedForm.DataAndFilt.lblAllEventsSize
T.english: Currently the local event database size is:
T.translated: Currently the local event database size is:

T.name: AdvancedForm.DataAndFilt.lblOldEventsSize
T.english: Events older than 60 days size is:
T.translated: Events older than 60 days size is:

T.name: AdvancedForm.DataAndFilt.lblHideFutureEventsLaterThan
T.english: Don't display events that are more than
T.translated: Don't display events that are more than

T.name: AdvancedForm.OccMaps.cbStarRaiseSetLines
T.english: Draw lines of the star-raise and star-set
T.translated: Draw lines of the star-raise and star-set

T.name: AdvancedForm.OccMaps.lblStarRaiseSet
T.english: When selected, thin light gray lines will be drawn on the occultation maps to indicate the locations on the Earth where the star altitude is zero, which also corresponds to the star raising or setting.
T.translated: When selected, thin light gray lines will be drawn on the occultation maps to indicate the locations on the Earth where the star altitude is zero, which also corresponds to the star raising or setting.

T.name: AdvancedForm.OccMaps.lblSynchrones
T.english: When selected, thin blue lines will be drawn on the occultation maps to show the shadow front at the moments of the asteroid shadow fully entering and beginning to leave the earth, assuming a spherical asteroid shape.
T.translated: When selected, thin blue lines will be drawn on the occultation maps to show the shadow front at the moments of the asteroid shadow fully entering and beginning to leave the earth, assuming a spherical asteroid shape.

T.name: AdvancedForm.Thresholds.lblWarning
T.english: Event properties that exceed the specified thresholds will be displayed in red:
T.translated: Event properties that exceed the specified thresholds will be displayed in red:

T.name: AdvancedForm.Thresholds.lblErrInTime
T.english: Error in time is greater then
T.translated: Error in time is greater then

T.name: AdvancedForm.Misc.lblPersonalPredDescr
T.english: Personal predictions is a new feature that allows you to include your own events in Occult Watcher. To do this create an occelmnt file with Occult v4 that contains the predictions you want and then copy it to the location shown below:
T.translated: Personal predictions is a new feature that allows you to include your own events in Occult Watcher. To do this create an occelmnt file with Occult v4 that contains the predictions you want and then copy it to the location shown below:

T.name: AdvancedForm.Misc.lblOverwriteDescr
T.english: In 'Group by Feed' mode normally Occult Watcher will show the elements from the most accurate prediction in the events list if there are duplicated predictions. If you want the data from the original feed prediction to the shown in the events list then check the option above.
T.translated: In 'Group by Feed' mode normally Occult Watcher will show the elements from the most accurate prediction in the events list if there are duplicated predictions. If you want the data from the original feed prediction to the shown in the events list then check the option above.

T.name: Occultations.msgCreateAccount
T.english: To be able to report your observations you need to have an OccultPlanning account.\r\nDo you want to create your account now?
T.translated: To be able to report your observations you need to have an OccultPlanning account.\r\nDo you want to create your account now?

T.name: Occultations.msgAccountNeeded
T.english: You need to configure an OccultPlanning account to be able to report observations.
T.translated: You need to configure an OccultPlanning account to be able to report observations.

T.name: txtWasCloudedOrFailed
T.english: Was clouded out or failed to observe
T.translated: Was clouded out or failed to observe

T.name: AccountOptionsForm.cbxNotify2
T.english: Notify me of site updates and observation reports
T.translated: Notify me of site updates and observation reports

T.name: AccountOptionsForm.lblNotify2
T.english: Notify me if other observers change their site location for my chosen events and when they report an observation. Notifications are sent by email from the last day before the event up to 7 days after the event.
T.translated: Notify me if other observers change their site location for my chosen events and when they report an observation. Notifications are sent by email from the last day before the event up to 7 days after the event.

T.name: frmUserInfo.lblHighestPrivacy
T.english: Others will see your announced site positions between 3 and 5 km away from their real location. Standard privacy is 1 to 2 km away. Enabling this setting may affect coordination as other may see you at a different chord as a result.
T.translated: Others will see your announced site positions between 3 and 5 km away from their real location. Standard privacy is 1 to 2 km away. Enabling this setting may affect coordination as other may see you at a different chord as a result.

T.name: GoogleMap.txtCurrentSelection-2
T.english: Your currently selected site coordinates are: {0}, {1}. {2}.{3}Right-click on the map to select a different site or click 'Enter station Info' to announce this site as your observing location.
T.translated: Your currently selected site coordinates are: {0}, {1}. {2}.{3}Right-click on the map to select a different site or click 'Enter station Info' to announce this site as your observing location.

T.name: GoogleMap.txtCurrentSelection-2a
T.english: The site is {0} from the central line
T.translated: The site is {0} from the central line

T.name: GoogleMap.txtCurrentSelection-2b
T.english: The star is below the horizon for this site
T.translated: The star is below the horizon for this site

T.name: frmConfirmSite.errStarBelowHorizon
T.english: The occulted star is below the horizon for your chosen site '{0}'.\r\n\r\nYou cannot announce this station. Please choose a different site.
T.translated: The occulted star is below the horizon for your chosen site '{0}'.\r\n\r\nYou cannot announce this station. Please choose a different site.

T.name: GoogleMap.txtClickForStreetView
T.english: Left click on the map to enter a street view mode. Then click on the street view marker to open up the street view window.
T.translated: Left click on the map to enter a street view mode. Then click on the street view marker to open up the street view window.

T.name: OptionsForm.msgConfirmSavedHomeSiteUpdate
T.english: Do you also want the coordinates of the saved site '{0}' to be updated?
T.translated: Do you also want the coordinates of the saved site '{0}' to be updated?

T.name: OptionsForm.msgConfirmUpdateHomeSite
T.english: Do you also want to update the coordintes of your home site with the updated coordinates for the '{0}' site?
T.translated: Do you also want to update the coordintes of your home site with the updated coordinates for the '{0}' site?

T.name: OptionsForm.msgHomeSiteNameWarning
T.english: Having a site called '{0}' is strongly discouraged! This name is reserved to be used as a referrence to your currently selected coordinates in OccultWatcher. Do you wish to keep the name '{0}' for this saved site anyway?
T.translated: Having a site called '{0}' is strongly discouraged! This name is reserved to be used as a referrence to your currently selected coordinates in OccultWatcher. Do you wish to keep the name '{0}' for this saved site anyway?

T.name: Occultations.msgNeedInternet1
T.english: You need an active internet connection to view the details on the web.
T.translated: You need an active internet connection to view the details on the web.

T.name: Occultations.msgNeedInternet2
T.english: You need an active internet connection to view the Online Map.
T.translated: You need an active internet connection to view the Online Map.

T.name: Occultations.msgNeedInternet3
T.english: Do you want to open up the path in Google Earth instead?
T.translated: Do you want to open up the path in Google Earth instead?

T.name: frmEventInfo.msgSuspectedDouble
T.english: This is a suspected double asteroid
T.translated: This is a suspected double asteroid

T.name: frmReportObservation.errBadDuration
T.description: {0} is replaced by the value entered by the user for occultation duration when reporting observation

T.name: AdvancedForm.DataAndFilt.lblIncludeSatelites
T.english: Include predictions of double asteroids which satelites may be positioned close by
T.translated: Include predictions of double asteroids which satelites may be positioned close by

T.name: AdvancedForm.OccMaps.lblGMVersion
T.english: GoogleMaps engine version to be used:
T.translated: GoogleMaps engine version to be used:

T.name: AdvancedForm.OccMaps.lblTerminator
T.english: When selected, thin yellow lines will be drawn on the occultation maps to show the locations on the Earth where the sun altitude is zero.
T.translated: When selected, thin yellow lines will be drawn on the occultation maps to show the locations on the Earth where the sun altitude is zero.

T.name: AdvancedForm.DataAndFilt.btnDeleteOldEvents2
T.english: Delete old events and cache now
T.translated: Delete old events and cache now

T.name: C2A.Developer
T.english: C2A for Windows is developed by Philippe Deverchère
T.translated: C2A for Windows is developed by Philippe Deverchère

T.name: C2A.Error001
T.english: X field value must be positive
T.translated: X field value must be positive

T.name: C2A.Error002
T.english: Y field value must be positive
T.translated: Y field value must be positive

T.name: C2A.Error003
T.english: Field size specification is incorrect. Please enter positive float numbers.
T.translated: Field size specification is incorrect. Please enter positive float numbers.

T.name: C2A.Error004
T.english: Rotation value must be greater than -360°
T.translated: Rotation value must be greater than -360°

T.name: C2A.Error005
T.english: Rotation value must be smaller than 360°
T.translated: Rotation value must be smaller than 360°

T.name: C2A.Error006
T.english: Field rotation specification is incorrect. Please enter a valid float number between -360 and +360.
T.translated: Field rotation specification is incorrect. Please enter a valid float number between -360 and +360.

T.name: C2A.Error007
T.english: Time before occultation must be between -96 and +96 hours
T.translated: Time before occultation must be between -96 and +96 hours

T.name: C2A.Error008
T.english: Time before occultation specification is incorrect. Please enter a valid float number between -96 and +96.
T.translated: Time before occultation specification is incorrect. Please enter a valid float number between -96 and +96.

T.name: C2A.Error009
T.english: C2A for Windows executable path is invalid. Please configure it using the Add-in menu.
T.translated: C2A for Windows executable path is invalid. Please configure it using the Add-in menu.

T.name: C2A.Error010
T.english: C2A field definition is invalid. Please configure it using the Add-in menu.
T.translated: C2A field definition is invalid. Please configure it using the Add-in menu.

T.name: C2A.Error011
T.english: Unable to connect to the existing instance of C2A. Please close all the C2A windows and try again.
T.translated: Unable to connect to the existing instance of C2A. Please close all the C2A windows and try again.

T.name: C2A.Error012
T.english: If C2a for Windows is not installed on your computer, you can get this free software from http://www.astrosurf.com/c2a/english/index.htm
T.translated: If C2a for Windows is not installed on your computer, you can get this free software from http://www.astrosurf.com/c2a/english/index.htm

T.name: C2A.LabelDisplayAsteroid
T.english: Display Asteroid in the Field (requires asteroid orbital elements to be loaded)
T.translated: Display Asteroid in the Field (requires asteroid orbital elements to be loaded)

T.name: C2A.LabelForceNomad
T.english: Force usage of the NOMAD catalog
T.translated: Force usage of the NOMAD catalog

T.name: C2A.LabelSingleInstance
T.english: Use a single instance of C2A when called from Occult Watcher
T.translated: Use a single instance of C2A when called from Occult Watcher

T.name: C2A.LabelLinkToC2aWebSite
T.english: Link to the C2a Web Site
T.translated: Link to the C2a Web Site

T.name: C2A.LabelLinkToOWWebSite
T.english: Link to get help for setting up the C2A add-in
T.translated: Link to get help for setting up the C2A add-in

T.name: C2A.Usage
T.english: To use the C2A Add-in, select an asteroid in the Occult Watcher list, go into the 'Add-ins' menu and select the command 'Create C2A Occultation Map'. You can also use the context menu accessible through a right click on a given asteroid in the list. This will launch automatically C2A and generate a field view of the occultation event.
T.translated: To use the C2A Add-in, select an asteroid in the Occult Watcher list, go into the 'Add-ins' menu and select the command 'Create C2A Occultation Map'. You can also use the context menu accessible through a right click on a given asteroid in the list. This will launch automatically C2A and generate a field view of the occultation event.

T.name: OWLH.txtInfoCopied
T.english: The following event info has been copied to the clipboard
T.translated: The following event info has been copied to the clipboard

T.name: OWLH.lblInfoFormat
T.english: Specify the string format of the info to be copied below. Use 'Insert Tag' button below to insert event information tags.
T.translated: Specify the string format of the info to be copied below. Use 'Insert Tag' button below to insert event information tags.

T.name: OWLH.txtSAORecordFound
T.english: SAO {0} exists in the Meade LX90 database.\r\n\r\nRA:{1}, DE:{2}, Mag:{3}
T.translated: SAO {0} exists in the Meade LX90 database.\r\n\r\nRA:{1}, DE:{2}, Mag:{3}

T.name: OWLH.txtSAORecordNotFound
T.english: SAO {0} could not be found in the Meade LX90 database.
T.translated: SAO {0} could not be found in the Meade LX90 database.

T.name: AdvancedForm.Misc.cbxCloudCoverColour
T.english: Show the cloud cover with colours
T.translated: Show the cloud cover with colours

T.name: AdvancedForm.Misc.lblCloudCoverColour
T.english: The cloud cover forecast is shown with a different colour of the submitted station markers on the shadow path graph.
T.translated: The cloud cover forecast is shown with a different colour of the submitted station markers on the shadow path graph.

T.name: txtCloudCoverInfo
T.description: {0} will be between 0 and 100, {1} will be one of: stable, unstable or highly instable and {2} will be the name of the weather service that provides the forecast
T.english: {0}% cloud cover and {1} weather forecast by '{2}'
T.translated: {0}% cloud cover and {1} weather forecast by '{2}'

T.name: frmEventInfo.lblJPLSmallBodyInfo
T.english: Asteroid data from JLP Small-Body Database
T.translated: Asteroid data from JLP Small-Body Database

T.name: C2A.Error013
T.english: After closing this dialog box, a Web Browser window will bring you to the C2A Web page.
T.translated: After closing this dialog box, a Web Browser window will bring you to the C2A Web page.

T.name: frmUserInfo.msgDeleteAccount
T.english: All existing announced stations and all personal account information saved on the server will be deleted. If you have made any observation reports they will be kept in the archive. Your observation reports may contain your station names, your name and the comments you have submitted. If you also want to delete your submitted reports as well please send a request to Hristo Pavlov at hristo_dpavlov@yahoo.com. Are you sure you want to delete your account?
T.translated: All existing announced stations and all personal account information saved on the server will be deleted. If you have made any observation reports they will be kept in the archive. Your observation reports may contain your station names, your name and the comments you have submitted. If you also want to delete your submitted reports as well please send a request to Hristo Pavlov at hristo_dpavlov@yahoo.com. Are you sure you want to delete your account?

T.name: frmUserInfo.msgDeleteAccount2
T.english: This operation cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
T.translated: This operation cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?

T.name: frmUserInfo.msgDeleteAccount3
T.english: Your account has been successfully deleted. Occult Watcher will now restart.
T.translated: Your account has been successfully deleted. Occult Watcher will now restart.

T.name: Feed.SatWatcher.Description
T.english: PLSAT is a list of mutual occultations and ecplises involving the satelites of Jupiter, Saturn and Uranus. The feed is maintained by Hristo Pavlov, Australia
T.translated: PLSAT is a list of mutual occultations and ecplises involving the satelites of Jupiter, Saturn and Uranus. The feed is maintained by Hristo Pavlov, Australia

T.name: SatInfoPrint.TitleSecondPart
T.description: This text is appended to 'xxx occults yyy' to form the printed form title

T.name: Occultations.msgConfirmHideEvent
T.description: {0} will be replaced with the asteroid name and {1} with the star name
T.english: Do you want to permanently hide the selected event involving {0} and {1}? When you hide events they won't be shown again unless their prediction is updated. You can press Ctrl + Shift + Z at any time to reset all hidden events so OccultWatcher will start showing them again.
T.translated: Do you want to permanently hide the selected event involving {0} and {1}? When you hide events they won't be shown again unless their prediction is updated. You can press Ctrl + Shift + Z at any time to reset all hidden events so OccultWatcher will start showing them again.

T.name: Occultations.msgResetHiddenFlag
T.english: If the 'hidden' flag has been set for any event, it will be reset now. Press OK to continue.
T.translated: If the 'hidden' flag has been set for any event, it will be reset now. Press OK to continue.

T.name: GoogleMap.msgNoFavoriteSites
T.english: You currently don't have favorite mobile locations defined. Create a new saved site from the Configurations form and check the 'Favorite Mobile Location' checkbox or right click on an announced station in the main form to add a favorite mobile location.
T.translated: You currently don't have favorite mobile locations defined. Create a new saved site from the Configurations form and check the 'Favorite Mobile Location' checkbox or right click on an announced station in the main form to add a favorite mobile location.

T.name: GoogleMap.txtObserveFromFavorite
T.description: Don't add space betwen {0} and 'here' and 'here' and {1}
T.english: To announce a station at this location click {0}here{1}
T.translated: To announce a station at this location click {0}here{1}

T.name: GoogleMap.txtDeleteFavorite
T.description: Don't add space betwen {0} and 'here' and 'here' and {1}
T.english: To delete this location from your favorites click {0}here{1}
T.translated: To delete this location from your favorites click {0}here{1}

T.name: GoogleMap.msgConfirmDeleteFavorite
T.english: Do you want to delete '{0}' from your favorite mobile locations?
T.translated: Do you want to delete '{0}' from your favorite mobile locations?

T.name: GoogleMap.msgAddToFavorites
T.english: Add '{0}' to my favorite mobile locations
T.translated: Add '{0}' to my favorite mobile locations

T.name: Feed.LinOccult.Description
T.description: {0} will be replaced with the location on the hard disk where to copy the prediction file to
T.english: LinOccult Personal Predictions are calculated and distributed by Andrey Plekhanov. You need to request your personal predictions from Andrey who is contactable by email on andyplekhanov@gmail.com and then copy the unzipped text file he will send you to '{0}'
T.translated: LinOccult Personal Predictions are calculated and distributed by Andrey Plekhanov. You need to request your personal predictions from Andrey who is contactable by email on andyplekhanov@gmail.com and then copy the unzipped text file he will send you to '{0}'

T.name: AdvancedForm.PersPred.lblPredictionsOverwriteDescr
T.english: OccultWatcher uses its own rules when deciding for duplicated predictions which prediction will be used as the 'best' available. You can overwrite those rules but if you do so, you won't be able to share your personal predictions with others.
T.translated: OccultWatcher uses its own rules when deciding for duplicated predictions which prediction will be used as the 'best' available. You can overwrite those rules but if you do so, you won't be able to share your personal predictions with others.

T.name: AdvancedForm.PersPred.cbOverwritePredMode
T.english: Use custom rules for which feeds overwrite the personal predictions
T.translated: Use custom rules for which feeds overwrite the personal predictions

T.name: Feed.NAmer.Description
T.english: North America low probability asteroid occultations calculated using Occult C# by Brad Timerson.
T.translated: North America low probability asteroid occultations calculated using Occult C# by Brad Timerson.

T.name: Feed.TNO.Description-NEW
T.english: TNO Extras is a list of asteroid predictions involving Trans Neptunian Objects and stars brighter than mag 15. The search is conducted using OccultV4, the latest astorb and NOMAD. Since May 2010 the feed also includes predictions computed by Bruno Sicardy and the Rio Team. The feed is maintained by Dave Gault, Australia
T.translated: TNO Extras is a list of asteroid predictions involving Trans Neptunian Objects and stars brighter than mag 15. The search is conducted using OccultV4, the latest astorb and NOMAD. Since May 2010 the feed also includes predictions computed by Bruno Sicardy and the Rio Team. The feed is maintained by Dave Gault, Australia

T.name: AdvancedForm.InstrMag.lblInstrCameraDescr
T.english: Calculate instrumental magnitudes and instrumental magnitude drops for the following camera model:
T.translated: Calculate instrumental magnitudes and instrumental magnitude drops for the following camera model:

T.name: AdvancedForm.InstrMag.llblTransformMoreInfo
T.description: {0} will be either 'Prediction' (see 'frmEventInfo.txtMagTypePrediction') or the corresponding camera model

T.name: AdvancedForm.InstrMag.lblAcquiringMagnitudes
T.english: Acquiring the colour magnitudes of the star from:
T.translated: Acquiring the colour magnitudes of the star from:

T.name: AdvancedForm.InstrMag.lblCalculatedValuesNote
T.english: The calculated values will be displayed on the event details panel.
T.translated: The calculated values will be displayed on the event details panel.

T.name: AdvancedForm.InstrMag.lblLimitingMagWarning
T.english: NOTE: The real limiting magnitude of what can be reliably observed as occultation is at least 1 magnitude brighter than the limiting magnitude of your video record.
T.translated: NOTE: The real limiting magnitude of what can be reliably observed as occultation is at least 1 magnitude brighter than the limiting magnitude of your video record.

T.name: AdvancedForm.InstrMag.lblQuickChangeDescr
T.english: Display a camera model drop down list on the staus bar allowing to change quickly the currently selected camera.
T.translated: Display a camera model drop down list on the staus bar allowing to change quickly the currently selected camera.

T.name: AdvancedForm.InstrMag.lblProvideMagsToAddins
T.english: Add-ins that make use of combined magnitudes and magnitude drops (such as the C2A Add-in) will be given instrumental magnitudes.
T.translated: Add-ins that make use of combined magnitudes and magnitude drops (such as the C2A Add-in) will be given instrumental magnitudes.

T.name: AdvancedForm.Thresholds.lblMagnDropErrorPercentage
T.english: Error in magn. drop is bigger than
T.translated: Error in magn. drop is bigger than

T.name: Feed.IBEROC.Description
T.english: This source aims to collect all kinds of occultations that happen on the Iberian Peninsula, Balearic and Canary Islands. As a result this includes: Spain, Portugal and some countries of NW Africa. The feed is maintained by Carlos Perelló.
T.translated: This source aims to collect all kinds of occultations that happen on the Iberian Peninsula, Balearic and Canary Islands. As a result this includes: Spain, Portugal and some countries of NW Africa. The feed is maintained by Carlos Perelló.

T.name: Feed.AOACM.Description
T.english: Asociación de Observatorios Argentinos de Cuerpos Menores - Ocultaciones para Argentina.
T.translated: Asociación de Observatorios Argentinos de Cuerpos Menores - Ocultaciones para Argentina.

T.name: Feed.UKOCL.Description
T.english: This feed collects occultation events for the United Kingdom and Ireland. Many of the predictions will also cross mainland Europe and/or Scandinavia. The feed is maintained by John Talbot.
T.translated: This feed collects occultation events for the United Kingdom and Ireland. Many of the predictions will also cross mainland Europe and/or Scandinavia. The feed is maintained by John Talbot.

T.name: Feed.CometOcc.Description
T.english: Comet Occultations is a list of occultations involving comets. The feed is maintained by Carlos Perelló.
T.translated: Comet Occultations is a list of occultations involving comets. The feed is maintained by Carlos Perelló.

T.name: Feed.LuckyStar.Description
T.english: Lucky Star is a list of events produced by the 'Lucky Star' project - an ERC Advanced Grant led by Bruno Sicardy at Paris Observatory / Univ. Pierre et Marie Curie. The predictions are converted into OW format by Dave Gault, Australia, www.kuriwaobservatory.com
T.translated: Lucky Star is a list of events produced by the 'Lucky Star' project - an ERC Advanced Grant led by Bruno Sicardy at Paris Observatory / Univ. Pierre et Marie Curie. The predictions are converted into OW format by Dave Gault, Australia, www.kuriwaobservatory.com

T.name: Feed.RioSatellites.Description
T.english: Rio Satellites is a list of events produced by the 'RIO' team. The predictions are converted into OW format by Dave Gault, Australia, www.kuriwaobservatory.com
T.translated: Rio Satellites is a list of events produced by the 'RIO' team. The predictions are converted into OW format by Dave Gault, Australia, www.kuriwaobservatory.com

T.name: Feed.ITALOccult.Description
T.english: This feed provides the predictions of occultations that cover Italy and the Canton Ticino (Switzerland). The orbital elements are taken from the AstDyS2 database maintained at the University of Pisa. The feed is edited by Gruppo Astrofili Massesi (info@italoccult.it)
T.translated: This feed provides the predictions of occultations that cover Italy and the Canton Ticino (Switzerland). The orbital elements are taken from the AstDyS2 database maintained at the University of Pisa. The feed is edited by Gruppo Astrofili Massesi (info@italoccult.it)
